author: Karl Rasmussen Sports Illustrated
title: NHL Revealed Stadium Series Uniforms for Red Wings, Blue Jackets and Fans Loved Them
text:
Sports
NHL Revealed Stadium Series Uniforms for Red Wings, Blue Jackets and Fans Loved Them
The 2025 NHL Stadium Series is coming to Ohio Stadium on March 1, when the Detroit Red Wings will take on the Columbus Blue Jackets in an outdoor game at the home of the Ohio State Buckeyes football team.
With a bit over a month until puck drop on the annual classic, NHL and Fanatics revealed the special uniforms the two teams will be wearing. As the home team, the Blue Jackets will be wearing a navy blue sweater which features a cannon on the front. The Red Wings will be in white, and their jerseys include "Detroit" written in slick, cursive writing. Their red helmets will also feature a white stripe down the middle and wings on the sides.
THE 2025 STADIUM SERIES JERSEYS ARE HERE
- ESPN (@espn)
March 1st in Ohio Stadium on ESPN[pic.twitter.com/qqq9VlzyZJ][January 16, 2025]
Fans had plenty to say about the unveiled uniforms, and the feedback the league received was overwhelmingly positive. Many fans expressed their appreciation for the Al the Octopus tag on the bottom of the Red Wings' uniforms, too.
Are...are the Red Wings going to wear Winged Helmets in Columbus?
- Maize n Brew (@MaizenBrew)
Incredible.[https://t.co/wAaZGMNbqr][January 16, 2025]
AL THE OCTOPUS JERSEY DETAIL
- Winged Wheel Podcast (@WingedWheelPod)[https://t.co/FVG7BbRPjc][pic.twitter.com/j9BFSjj69N][January 16, 2025]
wearing winged helmets in the shoe?
- Talon Gilchrist (@talonmg)[https://t.co/a4H3DdQQp8][pic.twitter.com/30SWOnXHng][January 16, 2025]
Mentioned by
- á´€Ê€á´…á´€ Ã–á´„á´€ÊŸ (@Arda)[@wyshynski]on The Drop:
Really fun Easter eggs on the Wings and Jackets stadium series sweaters
The Buckeye leaf and Al the Octopus[pic.twitter.com/mX5S6PvzTq][January 16, 2025]

author: Manuel Mucari and Nellie Peyton
title: Frelimoâ€™s Daniel Chapo wins contested Mozambique election
text:
World / Africa Frelimoâ€™s Daniel Chapo wins contested Mozambique election Runner-up has claimed fraud and called for protests, while observers say the election was not free and fair 24 October 2024 - 23:22 by Manuel Mucari and Nellie Peyton Support our award-winning journalism. The Premium package (digital only) is R30 for the first month and thereafter you pay R129 p/m now ad-free for all subscribers. Subscribe now Riot police look on as protesters burn tyres after Mozambiqueâ€™s ruling party, Frelimo, retains power in contested election in Maputo, Mozambique, October 24 2024. Picture: REUTERS/SIPHIWE SIBEKO
Maputo â€” Mozambiqueâ€™s ruling party Frelimo has retained power in this monthâ€™s election, extending its five-decade rule as the opposition accused it of fraud.
Frelimoâ€™s Daniel Chapo will succeed President Filipe Nyusi to become Mozambiqueâ€™s fifth president since its independence from Portugal in 1975. Nyusi is stepping down after serving the maximum two terms.
Chapo won over 70% of votes, the electoral commission said on Thursday. VenÃ¢ncio Mondlane, backed by the Podemos party, came second with 20% of votes, displacing former rebel movement Renamo, which had been the official opposition party but whose candidate came third.
In parliament, Frelimo increased its number of seats to 195 out of 250, more than the 184 it had before.
Observers have said the October 9 election was not free and fair. A EU mission reported irregularities during counting and alteration of results at the local and district level, problems which have marred most polls since Frelimo first allowed multiparty elections in 1994.
Daniel Chapo in Matola, Mozambique, October 6 2024. Picture: REUTERS/SIPHIWE SIBEKO The electoral commission has declined to comment on allegations of vote-rigging. A Frelimo spokesperson did not reply to requests for comment.
Shortly after Chapo was declared winner, Mozambiqueâ€™s sole dollar bond, maturing in 2031, fell for a fourth day, TradeWeb data showed as investors assessed the risk of unrest.
Mondlane, who has the support of many of the countryâ€™s young voters and claims he is the election winner, had already called for nationwide protests on Thursday and Friday. Groups of protesters started to gather in the capital Maputo after the result was announced.
Police on Monday used tear gas and gunfire to disperse opposition supporters protesting the murder of a Podemos lawyer and party official two days earlier, raising tensions.
Chapo, a lawyer, is seen as a business-friendly choice who analysts say is likely to maintain the status quo, including a fight against Islamist insurgents in the north and partnerships with companies such as ExxonMobil and TotalEnergies , which are trying to get major gas projects off the ground.
The country of nearly 35-million people is struggling with a large debt burden and worsening climate shocks, including drought and cyclones.
Reuters

title: El Movistar Team, de Nairo Quintana y Fernando Gaviria, estrena su temporada en Australia

El equipo masculino del Movistar ya estÃ¡ en Australia para abrir este sÃ¡bado la temporada con motivo de la prueba CritÃ©rium Villawood Menâ€™s Classic, donde entrarÃ¡n en liza Carlos Canal, Gregor MÃ¼hlberger, Javier Romo, Mathias Norsgaard, Manlio Moro y los debutantes Natnael Tesfatsion y el colombiano Diego Pescador.
SegÃºn la informaciÃ³n brindada este jueves en su web oficial, la formaciÃ³n espaÃ±ola estarÃ¡ en el estreno del calendario World Tour, tambiÃ©n en Australia, donde se disputa del 21 al 26 la ediciÃ³n nÃºmero 25 del Santos Tour Down Under.

Liderado por el espaÃ±ol Enric Mas, segundo en la Vuelta a EspaÃ±a 2018, 2021 y 2022 y tercero en la Ãºltima ediciÃ³n, la escuadra cuenta en sus filas con los colombianos Nairo Quintana -ganador del Giro de Italia en 2014 y de la Vuelta a EspaÃ±a en 2016-, Fernando Gaviria, Einer Rubio y Pescador; el venezolano Orluis Aular y el ecuatoriano Jefferson Cepeda.
El equipo femenino debutarÃ¡ en carrera el 25 de enero en Mallorca y, como novedad, finalizarÃ¡ la temporada en China.
DisputarÃ¡ cerca de 50 competiciones, incluyendo los campeonatos nacionales, europeos y mundiales, y sumando mÃ¡s de 130 dÃ­as de competiciÃ³n en 14 paÃ­ses: entre ellos, Alemania, BÃ©lgica, China, Emiratos Ãrabes Unidos, EspaÃ±a, Francia, Italia, Noruega, PaÃ­ses Bajos, Polonia, Reino Unido y Suiza.

title: Trump administration prepares to send more deported migrants to notorious El Salvador prison | Flipboard
text:
Trump administration prepares to send more deported migrants to notorious El Salvador prison CNN â€” The Trump administration is preparing to send more immigrants with criminal records to El Salvadorâ€™s notorious mega prison on the heels of a Supreme Court order allowing the use for now of a sweeping wartime authority for deportations, according to two US officials. El Salvador has emerged as a â€¦

author: Presstv
title: Egyptâ€™s ports â€˜major supply outletsâ€™ for Israel during war on Gaza
text: An open-source investigation has found that Egyptian seaports have become major stations for cargo and cement ships transporting goods to and from Israel since the war on the besieged Gaza Strip began last October. The investigation published on Thursday by Arabi Post monitored the activity of 19 ships over the past three months and tracked their sea routes, using open-source maritime data. It found that they were confined to traveling back and forth between Israeli and Egyptian ports. According to the report, dozens of other ships were also transporting goods to and from Israel but they were not limited to moving between the Israeli and Egyptian ports. During the same period, no ships from other Arab countries arrived at Israeli ports, the report said. â€œEgyptian ports are vital points for transporting goods to and from Israel due to their proximity to Israeli ports, especially Ashdod Port, which is about 29 kilometers away from Gaza, as well as the strategic Haifa Port,â€ Arabi Post said, noting that the closeness between the ports reduces shipping costs which affect the prices of shipped goods. The investigation is based on data from the activity of seven ports, including the Israeli ports of Ashdod and Haifa, and the Egyptian ports of Port Said, Abu Qir, Alexandria, Dekheila, and Damietta, which are located on the Mediterranean Sea. The 19 vessels included seven container ships, six cement carriers, five general cargo ships, and one bulk carrier which transports bulk cargo such as grains, sugar, and coal. The investigation showed that the seven container ships and the five general cargo ships primarily operated between Egypt's Alexandria, Damietta, Dekheila, Port Said, and al-Arish, and the Israeli ports of Haifa and Ashdod. These ships sailed under the flags of Panama, Liberia, Israel, Egypt, Antigua and Barbuda, Singapore, and Saint Kitts and Nevis. According to Vesselfinder ship tracking data, these 12 ships are owned by companies in Egypt, Israel, Turkey, Greece, Singapore, Germany and Cyprus. The investigation also found that the six cement carriers did not frequently visit Egyptian ports in 2022 and 2023, but their trips focused on Israel and Egypt during the war on Gaza, Arabi Post reported. The report noted that the ships primarily operated between the Egyptian ports of al-Arish, Abu Qir and Alexandria, and the Israeli ports of Haifa and Ashdod. Both al-Arish and Alexandria have cement factories. Egyptâ€™s trade with Israel has increased since the war on Gaza began in October. Arabi Post cited data as saying that Egypt's exports to Israel between October 2023 and July 31, 2024 hit $170.1 million, while exports during the same period in 2022 and 2023 amounted to $162.8 million. Egyptâ€™s imports from Israel after the war nearly tripled. Egyptâ€™s imports from Israel between October 2023 and July 2024 were $331.6 million, while imports during the same months of 2022 and 2023 amounted to $106.8 million. The investigation comes while Gaza is under complete siege, with Egypt saying Israel was not cooperating with the delivery of aid into the strip. author: Elsa Barrera
title: Ana del Castillo revelÃ³ que su expareja, el acordeonero 'Chide' GarcÃ­a, la dejÃ³ plantada en un concierto antes de terminar su relaciÃ³n: "Me dejÃ³ tocando sola" - Infobae
text:
Ana del Castillo y â€˜Chideâ€™ GarcÃ­a terminaron su relaciÃ³n profesional y sentimental - crÃ©dito @anadelcastilloj - @chide.garcia/Instagram La relaciÃ³n entre la cantante vallenata Ana del Castillo y el acordeonero â€˜Chideâ€™ GarcÃ­a, quienes formaban un dÃºo musical, llegÃ³ a su fin a mediados de agosto de 2024, apenas dÃ­as despuÃ©s de haber anunciado su compromiso en un evento pÃºblico.
SegÃºn informÃ³ El Heraldo , la pareja habrÃ­a protagonizado una acalorada discusiÃ³n en una discoteca de Bucaramanga, lo que desatÃ³ especulaciones sobre una posible separaciÃ³n. Este incidente ocurriÃ³ poco despuÃ©s de que el mÃºsico sorprendiera a la artista con una propuesta de matrimonio en el escenario del Parque Metropolitano SimÃ³n BolÃ­var, durante el festival de verano celebrado a inicios de agosto.
Ahora puede seguirnos en Facebook y en nuestro WhatsApp Channel .
La cantante vallenata afirmÃ³ que fue abandonada en un concierto luego de una discusiÃ³n - crÃ©dito @Dimelo.king/TikTok Inicialmente, se especulÃ³ que el desacuerdo podrÃ­a haberse originado por un retraso del acordeonero para llegar al lugar debido a que algunos asistentes al evento en Bucaramanga afirmaron que Ana del Castillo no se presentÃ³ junto a â€˜Chideâ€™ GarcÃ­a, sino que estuvo acompaÃ±ada por otro acordeonero conocido como el Pollo Robles; sin embargo, el programa Lo sÃ© todo revelÃ³ que la disputa estarÃ­a relacionada con una supuesta infidelidad por parte de GarcÃ­a.
En ese momento, la intÃ©rprete de Ã©xitos como Sabroso y Ya es mÃ­o ni â€˜Chideâ€™ GarcÃ­a emitieron declaraciones oficiales sobre los rumores de su separaciÃ³n. Sin embargo, la atenciÃ³n mediÃ¡tica en torno a este tema siguiÃ³ creciendo, y los fanÃ¡ticos de ambos artistas en el gÃ©nero vallenato se cuestionaban cuÃ¡l era la verdad tras su ruptura.
La cantante, conocida por su estilo Ãºnico y su capacidad para conectar con el pÃºblico, decidiÃ³ no callar mÃ¡s y aclarÃ³ los rumores en una entrevista en el pÃ³dcast Tamo en vivo de DÃ­melo King y otros influenciadores.
En un pÃ³dcast, la artista hablÃ³ sobre mantener la profesionalidad en medio de tensiones personales - crÃ©dito @chide.garcia/Instagram â€œLo que pasa es que se le da importancia a lo importante. Â¿Me entiendes? Lo que pasa es que cuando uno habla de temas de relaciones, uno termina siendo el malo: â€˜Uy, expuso las cosas, dijo, no dijoâ€™â€, comenzÃ³ diciendo la artista.
Del Castillo aclarÃ³ que no pensaba referirse al tema de su ruptura, pero quiso que se supiera la verdad: â€œYo nunca he hablado de eso, pero voy a decir algo muy puntual. Uno en la vida siempre tiene que ser agradecido y lo laboral no se mezcla con lo personal (...) Por ejemplo, yo tengo una gira contigo y tÃº peleaste conmigo. Yo igual te voy a pagar. TÃº tienes que tocarâ€.
â€œÂ¿Y Ã©l dejÃ³ metido un show?â€, preguntÃ³ el creador de contenido Elkin JesÃºs De La Hoz, conocido como DÃ­melo King, y la artista respondiÃ³: â€œSÃ­, claro, me dejÃ³ tocando sola. SÃ­, me dejÃ³ un show tirado, eso no es una mentira. No puedes mezclar un problema personal con un problema laboral, pero no pasa nada (...) Cuando tÃº mismo dejas tu propia papa tirada, eso es algo que ya estÃ¡ malâ€.
La propuesta de matrimonio del acordeonero ocurriÃ³ semanas antes de la ruptura - crÃ©dito @chide.garcia/Instagram Los comentarios en las redes sociales no se hicieron esperar. Algunos defendieron las declaraciones de la cantante y otros defendieron al acordeonero: â€œAna del castillo se ve muy linda asÃ­â€; â€œMe sorprende la madurez de Ana, estÃ¡ bastante centrada y un nivel emocional bastante desarrollado, al punto que no habla ni de lo bueno o malo. Solo es diplomÃ¡ticaâ€; â€œsiempre he visto de ella que nunca habla de lo que fue, sea bueno o malo, va paâ€™lanteâ€; â€œTiene toda la razÃ³n ðŸ’¯ðŸ‘â€; â€œSi no hay un contrato que lo obligue tu tampoco podÃ­as obligarloâ€.
DespuÃ©s de su ruptura con â€˜Chideâ€™ GarcÃ­a, la cantante vallenata Ana del Castillo oficializÃ³ su uniÃ³n musical con el reconocido acordeonero Sergio Luis RodrÃ­guez, que trabajÃ³ con figuras destacadas del gÃ©nero como Peter ManjarrÃ©s, Jorge CeledÃ³n y Elder DayÃ¡n.
La carrera de la artista ha estado marcada por su talento y por su capacidad para conectar con el pÃºblico, pero tambiÃ©n por episodios que han generado atenciÃ³n mediÃ¡tica. Este nuevo capÃ­tulo, con la incorporaciÃ³n de Sergio Luis RodrÃ­guez, podrÃ­a abrir nuevas posibilidades para la artista, tanto en tÃ©rminos musicales como en su relaciÃ³n con sus seguidores. Este cambio podrÃ­a ser una oportunidad para que la cantante consolide su carrera y explore nuevas facetas artÃ­sticas.
